peters_algorithm.utils.json_exporter module¶

class peters_algorithm.utils.json_exporter.JSONExporter[source]¶

Bases: object

Exports all object information to a json file

static export(*, filename: str, config: dict, environment: Environment, areas: list[peters_algorithm.base.world_container.area.Area])[source]¶

Export all object information from the given Environment and Area instances to a json file

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – Name of the file to be exported

  • config (dict) – Config file containing user defined parameters

  • environment (Environment) – Environment class instance

  • areas (list) – List of Area class instances
